topic.title: Dental Activity System Reporting - conformance rules

section.p: This class includes the data elements that are related to Dental Activity System.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dasId with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the dental encounter record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dasCategory with data type String
This is a pointer to DAS file.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentDisposition with data type Code
This is the treatment disposition as filed to DAS. Possible values are In progress; Completed; Terminated etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dasId with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the dental encounter record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dasCategory with data type String
This is a pointer to DAS file.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentDisposition with data type Code
This is the treatment disposition as filed to DAS. Possible values are In progress; Completed; Terminated etc.
